tag_list: vietnam, capitalist, investment, vc, venture-capitalist, hanoi, ho-chi-minh, cyberagent, cyberagent-ventures, hcmc
overview: After joined CyberAgent Inc., Mr. Nakayama worked as a cooperating with major web media companies and investment business at president office. October 2006, he joined start up member of the “media alliance company” which cooperate business in web media. He has contributed profitable project in early stage, that he received MVP. After that, he worked as a manager and he was the top class growing profitable business. July 2010, he joined CyberAgent Ventures, Inc. He worked investment for domestic venture companies and support management business. October 2010, he is in charge of investment activities and management support to venture companies in Vietnam.
